00009 EagleDbConsole* EagleDbConsole_New(void)
00010 {
00011     EagleDbConsole *console = (EagleDbConsole*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbConsole_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbConsole));
00012     if(NULL == console) {
00013         return NULL;
00014     }
00015     
00016     console->startTime = mach_absolute_time();
00017     
00018     return console;
00019 }

00021 char* EagleDbConsole_GetLine(void)
00022 {
00023     char *line = EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbConsole_GetLine.1", 100);
00024 #ifndef CUNIT
00025     char *linep = line, *linen = NULL;
00026     size_t lenmax = 100, len = lenmax;
00027     int c;
00028 #endif
00029     
00030     if(line == NULL) {
00031         return NULL;
00032     }
00033     
00034 #ifndef CUNIT
00035     while(1) {
00036         c = fgetc(stdin);
00037         if(c == EOF) {
00038             break;
00039         }
00040         
00041         if(--len == 0) {
00042             len = lenmax;
00043             linen = realloc(linep, lenmax *= 2);
00044             
00045             if(linen == NULL) {
00046                 EagleMemory_Free(linep);
00047                 return NULL;
00048             }
00049             line = linen + (line - linep);
00050             linep = linen;
00051         }
00052         
00053         if((*line++ = (char) c) == '\n') {
00054             break;
00055         }
00056     }
00057     *line = '\0';
00058     
00059     /* chomp */
00060     linep[strlen(linep) - 1] = '\0';
00061     
00062     return linep;
00063 #else
00064     EagleMemory_Free(line);
00065     return NULL;
00066 #endif
00067 }
00068 
00069 void EagleDbConsole_run(EagleDbConsole *console)
00070 {
00071 #ifndef CUNIT
00072     char *cmd = NULL;
00073     EagleDbInstance *db = EagleDbInstance_New(1000);
00074     
00075     while(1) {
00076         /* get line */
00077         printf("eagle> ");
00078         cmd = EagleDbConsole_GetLine();
00079         
00080         /* check for quit */
00081         if(NULL != cmd && strcmp(cmd, "\\q") == 0) {
00082             printf("Bye.\n");
00083             EagleMemory_Free(cmd);
00084             break;
00085         }
00086         
00087         /* parse */
00088         EagleDbInstance_execute(db, cmd);
00089         EagleMemory_Free(cmd);
00090     }
00091 #endif
00092 }

00094 void EagleDbConsole_Delete(EagleDbConsole *console)
